Connecting to a remote host via IP version 4 or 6 using Mirage

pkgmetadata.longdescription: Happy eyeballs is an implementation of [RFC 8305](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc8305) which specifies how to connect to a remote host using either IP protocol version 4 or IP protocol version 6. This is the core of the algorithm in value passing style, with a slick dependency cone.
